PreceptDef.label: expected
PreceptDef.description:
The true work of art is but a shadow of divine perfection. There is no valid excuse for shoddily executed art, and we shouldn't have to suffer it.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonists with "High" expectations or higher will demand high quality art. Art quality will be averaged between all art pieces present in the colony.

li.label: awful art
li.description: They say that art is not useless as long as it provokes any emotional response. The problem comes when that response is disgust...

li.label: poor art
li.description: I'm not gonna lie... this art is VERY poorly done.

li.label: normal art
li.description: The colony has some significant art pieces.

li.label: good art
li.description: There are some art pieces in this colony that are very high quality, I'm impressed.

li.label: excellent art
li.description: Wow! Some of the art pieces in this colony are incredible examples of fine art! Amazing!

li.label: masterwork art
li.description: Some of these pieces of art are going to be considered a masterwork in the future, like the famed Mona Lisa or Michelangelo's David.

li.label: legendary art
li.description: Our colony is renowned the world over for its incredible collection of fine art. No museum of old Earth could even compare.
